content: It’s no secret that vampires need blood to survive – but they’ve taken their blood lust to a new level with these sexy vampire menstrual pads. Designed to take advantage of the Twilight / romantic vampire craze, these pads can keep a vampire fed for an entire week!

Frolic around looking like a deer with this deer antler hat knitting pattern. You’ve struggled for years to grow antlers on your own, and despite your best efforts of trying to will yourself to evolve your cranium, your best bet is to knit yourself some antlers with this knitting pattern.

Jesus saves in many ways – but not many people know that he is quite the frugal penny pincher. With the Jesus saves piggy bank you can do the Lord’s work by saving all the loose change you find, bringing you one step closer to living like the holiest of holy.

Clean yourself with the power of the dark side with this giant Darth Vader soap bar. Weighing in at over two pounds, the giant Darth Vader soap bar is an easy way to get your <del>dumb kids</del> young padawans to wash their hands before dinner, but also makes a nice decorative piece.

Give your home bar an apt lighting system with these beer can track lights. Available in a variety of beer can styles, these unique track lights will transform your bar area from a dingy alcoholic’s sulking spot to a fun and lively party zone where everyone will want to go!

Relax in a bean bag of deliciousness with this baked potato bean bag. Featuring a hand dyed brown exterior and a butter shaped satin pillow for added comfort, the baked potato bean bag will be the most comfortable side dish you will ever lay down in.

A must have collector’s item for any fan of Alice in Wonderland, the iconic caterpillar has been painstakingly recreated with this felt sculpture that even includes the hookah smoking pipe and comes packaged with his leather signature patch and certificate of authenticity.

You might not own a hovering speeder bike, but you can still look like an intimidating storm trooper on your motorcycle with this leather stormtrooper riding mask. This steampunk style rider’s mask is hand made and can be safely worn at speeds up to 85 miles per hour.

Turn your mailbox into a groovy love machine with these VW Bus mailboxes. Available in a variety of psychedelic colors, these functional and handmade steel VW Bus mailboxes are perfect for expressing your individuality to all your neighbors and your mailman.

Win the heart of that special geek with these geeky romantic cards. Available individually or as a pack of five, these geeky romantic cards range from Zelda to Duck Hunt to Super Mario themes and will instantly make an old school gamer fall in love with you.

There’s a bomb in the house, and it smells amazing! Now with these clever dynamite stick incense holders you can burn incense sticks while freaking out your family. The incense stick will look like a wick burning away, ready to ignite the dynamite.

Now you can cast some disturbing shadows on your walls with these zombie shadow casters. Perfect for zombie themed parties, simply place these mini mahogany zombies in front of a small candle and a realistic zombie silhouette will appear behind it.

Own a pair of shoes that are out of this world with these hand painted and custom made galaxy shoes. Simply specify your shoe size, and your shoes will be painted in the awe inspiring style you see before you, or you can even request a different cosmic color scheme.

Walk tall and carry a big sword with this massive Devil May Cry inspired sword. This giant steel sword is both an artistic collector’s piece that would look great hanging on any wall, and a functional piece of weaponry that will dish out some serious destruction.

Add a pixelated stairway anywhere in your home with this 8-Bit secret stairway. Inspired by the retro art design of 8-Bit video games such as The Legend of Zelda, this clever floor decal is available in either Desert Sand or Dungeon Blue colors.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Moon Sticker
content: Add some lunar ambiance to your home with this giant glow in the dark moon sticker. Also available in smaller sizes, these glowing moon stickers are perfect for a kids room or just a neat hangout spot, giving you a beautiful display of art and science.

Give your dog some style with these assorted silly dog hats. With everything from viking hats to birthday cake hats, these hilarious dog hats will keep scruffums warm during the cold winter months while also giving him a stylish look that will surely be a conversation starter.

Now you can store your computer data on an external hard drive encased in the cartridge of arguably the greatest game ever made – the Legend of Zelda. Available in 500GB, 750GB, and 1TB versions, these Zelda cartridge hard drives are the ultimate geeky PC accessory.

Tired of being treated amazingly by strangers because of your dashing good looks? Want to experience the world while being treated like a disgusting slob? Well now you can with the permanently sweaty shirt that comes with sweat and pit stains that will never come off.

Show off your artistic side with this iPhone case that looks like a painter’s set of watercolors. These hand made iPhone cases are available in three different case colors and are a perfect gift idea for painters or people with a creative side in general.

Release the Kraken! Now you can smoke out of a beautifully crafted glass pipe shaped like a monstrous octopus. This functional piece of art measures just over seven inches in length, and come in a variety of colors – even glow in the dark versions!

Make yourself look like an evil genius with a brain so potent that it cannot be contained in a puny mortal skull! This knitted brain beanie is perfect for showing off your superior cranium, and will definitely be a conversation starter when worn.

Combine all the elements of strategy into one cute necklace with the rock paper scissors necklace. These hand made necklaces are crafted using a gold plated scissor charm, a torn piece of a novel’s page, and a small rock found from the shore of Lake Michigan.

Drop the subtleties of secret handshakes and catchphrases to identify yourself as a fellow Redditor – the Reddit alien hat will instantly make you identifiable as an intelligent and informed websurfer who also has a debilitating weakness for pictures of cats.

Style your home in retro geek style with the Pac-Man ottoman. Made from acrylic upholstery, these Pac-Man ottomans come in a variety of color combinations and are perfect for an arcade room or geeky lounge area. Not recommended for houses haunted by ghosts.

Drink from a coffee mug with attitude – the spikey coffee mug is a handmade cup that takes no prisoners and lives by its own rules. Available in a variety of colors, these spikey coffee mugs are perfect for adding a little toughness to your morning cup of joe.

Crown yourself as the Queen with these solid fourteen carat gold crown rings. Made to order with custom ring sizes, the crown ring will fit perfectly on your royal fingers, or makes a great gift idea for people who always dreamed of being a highborn.

You’ve researched your target, prepared the room so as to not leave any evidence, and now you can perform your morning ritual of being a cereal killer with this clever spoon. The cereal killer spoon is a hand stamped vintage spoon, and makes a great gift for heavy cereal eaters.

Carry and protect your baby ninja turtle style with this turtle shell baby harness. The turtle shell is an attachment for the baby bjorn harness, and will give your newborn baby the confidence that the hardened shell of a turtle has got his back – literally.

Be the center of attention all night long with this head turning disco ball dress. Whether you’ve got Saturday night fever or just love flashy apparel, the disco ball dress will instantly become your favorite little outfit for painting the town red.

Look like a true hero with this epic hand crafted leather dragon slayer armor. Even if you aren’t a dragonborn, you can still look like an epic warlord with this armor. Each piece of the dragon slayer armor set is made to order using 7/8 ounce leather.

Geek up your home with these retro Pac-Man style ghost bookshelves. Perfect for storing books, displaying pictures, and even scaring off interested dates you bring back home, these pixelated Pac-Man ghosts are a must have home accessory for grew up on the game.

Accordions might not have the mainstream appeal that an instrument like a guitar has, but these full size accordion pillows will surely be a favorite in any home. These accordion pillows are capable of compressing and expanding just like the real instrument.

Commit to that special someone like a true geek with these Star Trek engagement rings. With a sterling silver Trekkie insignia design, these engagement rings are perfect for the couple who wish to love and honor each other and live long and prosper.

When the narwhal isn’t baconing at midnight, he’s lounging around in absolute comfort. Now you can share that comfy feeling with these fancy narwhal plushies. Featuring a mustache and monocle, the fancy narwhal plushie exudes class and makes a great snuggle buddy.

Was your home built on an Indian burial ground? Have ghosts been whispering to you instructions to murder your family? If so, you’ve got a ghost infestation problem. Buy yourself a Ghostbusters proton backpack and take care of those pesky apparitions once and for all.

Light up the night in TRON like style with these neon light up sneakers. These handmade light up sneakers use an on board circuitry and an included battery source to create a stunning neon effect at night time, perfect for turning heads at the club or rave.

Be prepared for whatever the land of <del>Hyrule</del> suburbia might throw at you with these Zelda inspired bomb bags. A perfect collector’s item for Zelda gamers, with three soft throw-able yarn bombs included you’ll easily keep the bad guys at bay.

Electrify your audience with beautiful displays of color with these double rainbow hula hoops. With super bright LEDs, these rechargeable rainbow hula hoops are a fun twist on a classic toy and can even be customized with own your choice of LED colors.

Experience earception with these earrings that look like mini ears that have earrings! With a disturbing yet realistic design, these mini ear shaped earrings are hand made and make a great gift idea for people who love strange jewelry.

Slice and dice ingredients for your next meal with this geeky 8-bit Super Mario cutting board. These custom made 8-bit cutting boards are extremely durable and hand finished pixelated masterpieces, and are available in other styles such as Space Invaders.

It’s a trap! These functional bear trap necklaces aren’t for casual jewelry fashionistas – they open and close like a real bear trap with sharp teeth. Available in sterling silver or oxidized black, these clever necklaces make great gifts for outdoorsy types.

It may not bend space and time, but this Doctor Who inspired Tardis bag works great as a carry all for your gear. Constructed using a thick blue felt, the Tardis bag is finely made with an adjustable zipper, adjustable straps, and built in pockets for organized storage.

What should you wear to that wine tasting party? How about a hand made wool vine of grapes necklace! Perfect for wine lovers, this unique and eco-friendly necklace will be an instant conversation starter and also can be ordered with the matching grape earrings.

Show off your destructive side by wearing one of these mini wrecking ball necklaces. You’ll feel the weight of the solid brass wrecking ball swing as you move about, striking terror in the eyes of your fellow man as the unstoppable momentum builds on the ball.

Warm your home without literally warming your home with these 8-bit fireplace art pieces that are reminscent of the pixelated fires you would see in the Legend of Zelda games. Available in various sizes for different fireplace styles, these geeky fireplaces great for retro gamers.

If you love that classic style of 1950s pin-up girls, these swinging girl necklaces will be a perfect addition to your jewelry collection. Hand cut and soldered, these quaint necklaces come with a seventeen inch sterling silver chain and make a perfect gift for pin-up girl fans.

Barbequing is serious business, and you need a serious grill if you want to be called the grill master. Now you can strike fear in the hearts of salad eaters at the Sunday BBQ with this pistol BBQ grill, and use gun powder to give extra flavor on your steaks, ribs, and chicken.

Turn your chairs into puzzle pieces with these unique jigsaw puzzle chairs that interlock with each other. Available in a variety of colors, the top seat piece of each chair is adjustable, so you can literally rearrange the pieces like you would a real puzzle.

Finish off your wedding cake with an honest touch with these video game addict wedding cake toppers. Available with everything from Starcraft to Call of Duty, these cake toppers are the perfect way to mark the end of his all night gaming sessions and the start of marriage.

Light up your bedroom with a recycled vintage camera that has been masterfully converted into a nightlight. These vintage camera night lights use standard bulbs and even have a sensor that turns them on automatically when the room gets dark at night time.

Add some artistic and unusual lighting to your home with these drippy faucet night lights. Created using real plumbing supplies, turning the valve acts as a light switch for the night light – lefty loosey to turn it on, right tighty to turn it off.

Make yourself look harder, better, faster, and stronger with these replica Daft Punk helmets. These one size fits all helmets include four bright LEDs, an adjustable computer chip for light speeds, and a sealed gold finish for that authentic look.

Use the force to rock out like a true geek with this Star Wars Millennium Falcon guitar! With real working lights and sound effects and a tribute to R2-D2 at the headstock, this playable electric guitar is unquestionably the holy grail of geeky guitars.

Light up your home in a unique and eco-friendly manner – these recycled mini light bulbs are actually oil lamps. Each oil lamp includes a hand made wooden base with a satin finish, and come with easy to install cotton wicks and instructions.

You’re not losing your mind – these incredibly detailed objects that look like edible foods are in fact bars of soap! With everything from Oreos to gummy bears to choose from, these hand made food shaped soap bars not only look great, but they smell great too.

Hyrule is a dangerous place to venture alone – take these house keys! Easy to mount while not causing any damage to your walls, these nostalgic key hangers are a must have household item for old school Legend of Zelda fans.

Load up on your stars and magic mushrooms, because the enemies of the Mario universe have begun their assault on the real world. These Super Mario style chain chomp earrings look like your ears are being nom’ed on by the chain chomps from the Koopa Troop.

The word “useless” gets thrown around a lot on ThisIsWhyImBroke – but these Fine China Brass Knuckles take the cake. Made from real recycled fine China dinnerware, these ironic brass knuckles are perfect for the girl who loves eco-friendly and useless jewelry.

People keep telling you to get a life, but now you can finally show them that they’re idiots – you’re already at full health with these geeky life bar necklaces that also glows in the dark! Inspired by retro video games life bar displays, these necklaces are perfect for a stylish geek.

Want a coffee table that doubles as a fully functional Nintendo controller? This giant hand crafted Nintendo controller coffee table is made from mahogany, and includes a removeable glass top when you want to use it as a gaming controller.

Enjoy the touch and feel of an antique typewriter while still having the modern features of a keyboard and computer with these USB typewriters. Available in a variety of different styles, these modified type writers are truly a hipster’s wet dream.

Own a tiny piece of arcade gaming history with these collectible mini arcade machines. From Street Fighter to Mortal Kombat, each one of these incredibly detailed mini arcades will remind you of your glory days in the arcades, before the era of console gaming.

Throw out those lame family portraits and invest in these custom made zombie paintings. These personalized zombie portraits are hand painted using a photo of you as inspiration, giving you a unique insight into what you’d look like in zombie form.

titleEN: You Are Not The Father Card
content: Few words in the language of men bring greater joy than “you are not the father”. For years, Maury Povich has been delivering this life saving announcement to potential dead beat dads on his talk show, but now you too can deliver the great news with these cards!

Geek out in total comfort with this cleverly designed set of Star Trek pillows. This complete set of geeky throw pillows includes the gold command pillow, blue science pillow, and red engineering pillow – or you can order each pillow individually.

Keep your head warm while looking like a classic gaming icon with the Mega Man hat. This full size replica Mega man helmet is made from a comfortable fleece material, giving you bold looks and insulation during the cold winters your geeky heart desires.

Ever wonder what Beavis and Butthead would look like in real life? These life like sculptures were designed by special effects makeup artist Kevin Kirkpatrick for an art show he was attending, creating a realistic non-cartoon form of the famous characters.

Embrace the inevitable zombie apocalypse with the Zombie Attack Bed Covers. This gory bed set includes a blanket cover and two pillow cases that are screen printed and hand painted with zombie arms, and an ample spread of blood throughout.

Now you can give someone special your heart without ripping out your own literal heart. These life like human hearts are amazingly made entirely from felt, so not only are they awesome to look at, but they are also soft and cuddly.

Live long and prosper in style with these Star Trek Vulcan Beanies with attached ear covers. These incredibly geeky Vulcan hats will keep your head warm while also turning you into an enlightened, emotionless, and perfectly logical being. Kid’s sizes are also available.

When the Discovery Channel announced it would begin replacing Shark Week with Narwhal Week, an all out war erupted between sharks and narwhals. Still yet to be caught on film, this painting is a rare glimpse into one of the many epic battles being waged right now.

Power up your collection of footwear with these hand painted Super Mario high top sneakers that feature all the classics from the Super Mario series – from goombas to pirahna plants to power stars to Bowser himself – these will be the most nostalgic shoes you’ll ever own.

Keep your drink insulated and your hands dry with this cute monster shark drink cozy. Hand knit from machine washable acrylic, these shark drink cozies come in a variety of colors and make a great gift for a Shark Week themed drinking party!

Recycling and steampunk will never look better than they do on this Optimus Prime statue. Standing nearly nine feet tall and weighing in at over a thousand pounds, this steampunk Optimus Prime statue is an incredible art piece for both geeks and steampunks enthusiasts.

Keep track of your progress while reading your favorite book with these clever Wicked Witch Bookmarks. Made from polymer clay and thick cardboard, the feet of the wicked witch will stick out over two inches so you’ll easily be able open to the page you were last on.

If you want to stay looking trendy on those long space travels, nothing tops these Princess Leia headphones. Designed to fit comfortably over your royal ears, these Princess Leia style buns also work great in the winter as earmuffs. May the Schwartz be with you.

Are you feeling lucky today, punk? The .44 magnum is one of the most powerful handguns in the world, capable of blowing your head clean off – and now it’s the manliest ring in the world. This ring makes a great gift for guns enthusiasts, and Dirty Harry impressionists.

Have a geeky jam session with this Pac-Man shaped ukulele. This fully functional ukulele is made out of maple with an ipa fretboard. These ukuleles are also available in various styles such as Steampunk, Transformers, Cupcake, and Panda style via Celetano’s shop.

Looking for a cute way to show off your inner pyscho? Then you should try the chainsaw necklace charm – this unique hand made silver necklace charm is a great gift idea for people who love unusual and interesting jewelry and comes with the necklace chain too.

It’s dangerous to go alone, take this Zelda Master Sword USB Drive! This Zelda Sword unsheathes to reveal the USB drive, comes in various memory sizes from 4 GB all the way up to 32 GB, and makes a great gift idea for Zelda fans.

Roll out looking like a true Autobot with this Steampunk Optimus Prime Helmet. This highly detailed, battle worn, bronze finished Optimus Prime helmet is a full size adult costume helmet but also makes a great display piece for any geeky room.

Looking to decorate your home with something intense? Try the steampunk predator statue – this giant statue stands over eight feet tall and weighs over half a ton! Made from recycled metals, this Predator statue will easily be the greatest thing you ever own.

If you love narwhals, these handmade clay narwhal figurines will be your kryptonite. Each little narwhal figurine is just under five inches long when including the size of it’s horn, and because they are hand made figurines no one narwhal is alike.

Live your life on the edge by washing your hands with grenades! These hand grenade soap bars are custom made to look like the standard issue World War II style steel body hand grenade and make a cool house warming gift for military families.

Our spidey sense is tingling – it’s saying we’re about to go broke thanks to this unbelievable Metal Spiderman Table from the amazing Kreatworks Etsy shop that specializes in huge metallic statues. This Spiderman Table is a definite must buy for Spiderman fans.

Go to war with these Warhammer Nerf Guns – available in both pistol and rifle form. These Warhammer fire arms are fully functional hand painted modified Nerf guns with incredible detail and make a cool gift idea for Warhammer fans.

Show off your geeky side with these piranha plant earrings. These hand made earrings are modeled after the always troublesome piranha plants from the Super Mario games, and have a clever design where it looks like the plant is biting on your ears.

Protect your precious computer files with the Zelda Hylian Shield USB thumb drive. This custom made Zelda Hlian USB thumb drive is handmade and comes in multiple gigabyte sizes and makes a great gift for geeks, gamers, and Zelda fans alike.

If you want to classy up your home office then look no further than the Steampunk computer monitor and keyboard. This Steampunk themed monitor and keyboard combo perfectly captures the artistic styles of the Victorian era and makes a cool gift idea for Steampunk fans.

Fight off evil blood suckers with this Vampire Hunting Kit. The kit includes everything you’ll need to kill a vampire such as but not limited to: a cross sharpened into a dagger, vintage coffin nails, vintage holy bible, and all the other essentials to kill a vampire.

These bold Russian style AK-47 lamps can be powered by electricity or vodka and make a great gift for thugs, gangsters, goons, and mobsters alike. Each AK-47 lamp is hand made with extra attention to detail and stand nearly three feet tall.

These are the droids you’re looking for… The R2-D2 Beanie is a hand knitted head warmer styled after one of the most easily recognized Star Wars characters and is a cool gift for Star Wars geeks. Quantity is limited on these R2-D2 Beanies so act fast.

From the depths of the murky sea arises this massive tentacle candle holder. Created with influences from classic tales of sea monsters, the Tentacle Candle Holder is a very unique way to display your candles in your home.

Sweet Jesus, rage face and internet meme paintings? Ah Yeahhhhhhh, this will go great in the bachelor frog pad, but fffffffuuuuuuuuuuuu this is going to break the bank! These Internet Meme Paintings are the perfect gift for the Reddit gift exchange.

In the year 2053 Nerf technology has become the dominant form of handgun ammunition. This Steampunk styled Nerf handgun is painted by hand to give it that amazing steampunk look and feel, and also includes six Nerf darts.

These hand made finger puppets wonderfully capture the essence of Bob Ross, the amazing man who taught us the joy of painting. With these finger puppets, you can keep Bob Ross’ legacy going by teaching a younger generation the joy of painting.

What you’re looking at isn’t a real playstation controller, it’s a bar of soap! This playstation controller soap bar is “grape soda” scented and is made with high quality soap ingredients and is a great gift idea for the hygienically forgetful gamer.

Show your undying love with bow knot rings available in all sizes and in both gold and sterling silver. This romantic gift is an thoughtful ring to give someone who you want to remind that you always love them, especially as a gift for valentines or an anniversary.
